title: Sarah Palin to Seek New Trial After Losing Defamation Case Against New York Times
sub_head: Former vice-presidential nominee’s legal team also wants to disqualify judge, interview jurors after unusual proceedings
body:
Former Republican vice presidential nominee Sarah Palin plans to seek a new trial in her defamation lawsuit against the New York Times , as well as the disqualification of the judge, after she lost her case following an unusual sequence of court proceedings.
U.S. District Judge Jed Rakoff in Manhattan outlined the Palin team’s plans in a brief telephone hearing Wednesday in which he was the only person to speak at length.
